text:
MEMORIAL CENTER, PURDUE UNIVERSITY, LAFAYETTE, INDIANA
Lafayette 92-2961
THE MIDWEST PROGRAM ON AIRBORNE TELEVISION INSTRUCTION
OFFICES ALSO IN NEW YORK AND CHICAGO
December 23, I960
Mr. William G. Harley
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Suite 1119-DuPont Circle Office Bldg.
13^6 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
A belated thank you for your note of congratulations. This incidentally
is the only notice of my re-election I have seen. It should be fun
serving on the board these next two years which I know will be historic
ones for the NAEB.
I hope you and your family are going to enjoy this holiday season
in the Nation's Capitol.
Sincerely,
/
James S. Miles
Director
Program Service and
Distribution Division
JSM:cb
